name: sfchronicle
text: Dereck Rodriguez, who enjoyed a superb rookie season with the Giants in 2018 but struggled in 2019 and didn’t find a groove in 2020, has been designated for assignment. https://t.co/RT86ooGwW1

name: sfchronicle
text:
The Giants and Dodgers are in discussions to boycott Wednesday night's game at Oracle Park.

“I have the utmost respect for the players who are refusing to be silent about issues that are bigger than sports,” said Giants manager Gabe Kapler. 

https://t.co/P69f3TxDmL

name: sfchronicle
text: Because a large portion of people with COVID-19 are asymptomatic, or pre-symptomatic, skipping testing for these people would be counterproductive to efforts to contain the virus, local health officials and epidemiologists say. https://t.co/CCztTMHEVh
